description:
Build the landing page (/) for Praxy - an AI learning platform for business skills. Brand identity:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Warning Orange #F4A261, Error Rose #E76F51, Text Charcoal #264653, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Typography: Headings use Nunito (Google Font) weights 600/700/800, Body uses Inter (Google Font) weights 400/500/600

Design: 16px rounded corners for cards, 8px for buttons, warm cream background NOT white, subtle warm shadows rgba(38, 70, 83, 0.1)

Create a Praxy mascot component - a friendly coral (#FF6B6B) rounded blob/circle with two white dots for eyes and a gentle curved white smile. 120px size for hero.

Hero Section:
- Large Praxy mascot (120px, waving/friendly animation)
- Heading: 'Leetcode for Business Skills' (Nunito 800, 48px, Charcoal)
- Subheading: 'Master balance sheets, cold calls, and root cause analysis with Praxy â€” your AI study buddy.' (Inter 400, 18px)
- Tagline: 'Even rocket science, we'll learn it together.' (Inter 500, italic, Teal color)
- CTA Button: 'Start with Balance Sheets â†’' (Coral gradient, white text, 16px padding, links to /dashboard)

What You'll Learn Section:
- Section title: 'Start with Balance Sheet Mastery'
- Description: 'Learn to read financial statements like a pro. 10 levels from "Is this company alive?" to full financial health analysis.'
- 3 Benefit Cards:
  1. 'ğŸ“Š Visual Learning' â€” 'Color-coded breakdowns. See the health of a company at a glance.'
  2. 'ğŸ® Gamified Progress' â€” '10 levels, badges, and XP. Learning that actually sticks.'
  3. 'ğŸ¢ Real Companies' â€” 'Practice with Tesla, Zomato, and more. Not boring textbook examples.'

Coming Soon Section:
- 'More simulators coming soon:'
- Two grayed-out cards:
  - 'ğŸ“ Cold Call Hero â€” Practice selling to real companies'
  - 'ğŸ” RCA Detective â€” Solve metric drops like a PM'
- Text: 'Join the waitlist' with optional email input

Footer:
- 'Built with â¤ï¸ for Runable x ElevenLabs Hackathon'
- 'Â© 2026 Praxy'

Make it warm, friendly, game-like - NOT corporate. Generous padding and spacing. Mobile responsive.

Build the Dashboard page (/dashboard) with the same brand tokens:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Text Charcoal #264653, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Top Bar:
- Praxy logo/name on the left (coral color)
- Stats on the right: 'â­ 450 XP' and 'ğŸ”¥ 3 day streak'

Praxy Greeting Card:
- 48px Praxy mascot avatar on left (the coral blob with white eyes and smile)
- Speech bubble with coral gradient background and white text:
  'Hey! Ready to decode some balance sheets today?'
- Rounded corners, slight shadow

Main Section - Balance Sheet Mastery Card (large, prominent):
- Icon: ğŸ“Š (large)
- Title: 'Balance Sheet Mastery'
- Subtitle: 'Learn to read financial statements in 10 levels'
- Progress bar: 'Level 1/10' â€” 10% filled (coral gradient fill, gray background)
- Stats row: '0 XP earned' | '0 badges' | '0 sessions'
- Button: 'Start Learning â†’' (Coral gradient, links to /balance-sheet)

Coming Soon Section:
- Two smaller, grayed-out cards side by side:
  - 'ğŸ“ Cold Call Hero' â€” 'Coming Soon' yellow badge
  - 'ğŸ” RCA Detective' â€” 'Coming Soon' yellow badge

Use warm cream background (#FDF8F3), Nunito for headings, Inter for body. Make it feel warm and game-like. Mobile responsive.

Build the Balance Sheet Hub page (/balance-sheet) with brand tokens:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Text Charcoal #264653, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Header:
- Back arrow linking to /dashboard
- Title: 'Balance Sheet Mastery'
- Progress text: 'Level 1 of 10'

Praxy Introduction Card:
- 48px Praxy mascot avatar
- Speech bubble with coral gradient background, white text:
  'Let's learn to read balance sheets! We'll start simple â€” can this company pay its bills? By Level 10, you'll analyze any company like a pro.'

Level Roadmap (vertical list of 10 levels):

Level 1 - Current (highlighted with coral border, white background):
- 'Level 1: The Liquidity Check'
- Concept: 'Current Ratio'
- Question: 'Is this company alive?'
- Status: 'ğŸ”“ Ready to start'
- Button: 'Start Level 1 â†’' (links to /balance-sheet/level/1)

Levels 2-10 - Locked (gray background, muted, lock icon):
- Level 2: 'The Debt Detective' â€” 'Who owns this company?' ğŸ”’
- Level 3: 'The Cash King' â€” 'Where's the money?' ğŸ”’
- Level 4: 'Asset Inspector' â€” 'What do they actually own?' ğŸ”’
- Level 5: 'Profit Reality Check' â€” 'Does profit = cash?' ğŸ”’
- Level 6: 'Efficiency Expert' â€” 'How fast does money move?' ğŸ”’
- Level 7: 'Growth Analyzer' â€” 'Is this growth healthy?' ğŸ”’
- Level 8: 'Return Master' â€” 'Is this investment worth it?' ğŸ”’
- Level 9: 'Red Flag Spotter' â€” 'What's hidden?' ğŸ”’
- Level 10: 'Full Analysis' â€” 'Put it all together' ğŸ”’

Each locked level shows: 'Complete previous level to unlock'

Practice Companies Section:
- Title: 'You'll practice with real companies:'
- Three small cards in a row:
  - Tesla â€” 'Tech/Auto'
  - Zomato â€” 'Food Delivery'
  - FailCorp â€” 'Struggling Startup (Fictional)'

Use warm cream background, Nunito for headings, Inter for body. Mobile responsive.

Build the Level 1 Learning page (/balance-sheet/level/1) with brand tokens:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Text Charcoal #264653, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Header:
- Back arrow linking to /balance-sheet
- 'Level 1: The Liquidity Check'
- Step indicator showing 3 steps: 'Learn' (active/highlighted), 'Quiz', 'Complete' with dots or line connecting them

Praxy Teaching Card:
- Large Praxy mascot (80px)
- Speech bubble: 'First things first â€” is this company even alive? Let's check if they can pay their bills this year.'

Concept Card (prominent, with nice styling):
- Title: 'THE CURRENT RATIO' (uppercase, bold)
- Formula displayed prominently in a styled box:
  'Current Ratio = Current Assets Ã· Current Liabilities'
- What it tells you: 'Can this company pay its short-term bills?'

Tesla Balance Sheet Visual (create a visually appealing, color-coded display):
- Header: 'TESLA BALANCE SHEET (2024)'
- Two columns side by side:
  - Left column (green-tinted): CURRENT ASSETS (What they HAVE)
    - Cash: $16.4B
    - Receivables: $3.0B
    - Inventory: $14.7B
    - Other: $1.8B
    - TOTAL: $35.9B (bold)
    - ğŸŸ¢ HAVE label
  - Right column (orange-tinted): CURRENT LIABILITIES (What they OWE this year)
    - Payables: $14.4B
    - Accrued: $5.3B
    - Deferred: $1.8B
    - TOTAL: $21.5B (bold)
    - ğŸŸ  OWE label

Big Calculation Display:
- 'CURRENT RATIO = $35.9B Ã· $21.5B = 1.67'
- Color-coded result with green badge: 'ğŸŸ¢ HEALTHY'

Threshold Legend (horizontal row of 3 items):
- ğŸŸ¢ Above 1.5 = 'Healthy â€” Comfortable buffer'
- ğŸŸ¡ 1.0 to 1.5 = 'Acceptable â€” Tight but okay'
- ğŸ”´ Below 1.0 = 'Danger â€” Owes more than it has'

Praxy Insight Card (teal #2A9D8F background, white text):
- 'ğŸ’¡ THE INSIGHT' title
- 'Tesla has $1.67 for every $1 they owe this year. They can comfortably pay their short-term bills. That's a healthy company!'
- 'Remember: Current Ratio is your first health check. If it's below 1.0, that's a red flag.'

Button at bottom: 'Got it! Take me to the Quiz â†’' (Coral gradient, large, links to /balance-sheet/level/1/quiz)

Use warm cream background, Nunito for headings, Inter for body. Mobile responsive.

Build the Level 1 Quiz page (/balance-sheet/level/1/quiz) - a fully interactive quiz with 5 questions, feedback modals, and score tracking. Brand tokens:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Error Rose #E76F51, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Text Charcoal #264653, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Header:
- Back arrow linking to /balance-sheet/level/1
- 'Level 1 Quiz'
- 'Question X of 5' progress text
- Progress bar that fills as user progresses (20% per question, coral gradient fill)

Store these 5 quiz questions and implement full interactivity:

Question 1 (Visual Comparison):
- Praxy avatar (thinking expression - eyes looking up) with speech bubble: 'Quick check! Which company can pay its short-term bills?'
- Two clickable option cards side by side:
  - Card A: 'COMPANY A' - Current Assets: $500K, Current Liab: $300K, Current Ratio: 1.67, [SELECT] button - CORRECT
  - Card B: 'COMPANY B' - Current Assets: $300K, Current Liab: $450K, Current Ratio: 0.67, [SELECT] button
- Clicking a card highlights it with teal border
- Collapsible hint section: 'ğŸ’¡ Need a hint?' - expands to show 'Remember: Above 1.5 = healthy, Below 1.0 = danger zone'

Question 2 (Yes/No):
- Praxy asks: 'Company X has a Current Ratio of 0.8. Can they comfortably pay their short-term debts?'
- Two cards: YES | NO (correct is NO)
- Explanation for wrong: 'A ratio below 1.0 means they owe more than they have in liquid assets.'

Question 3 (Multiple Choice):
- Praxy asks: 'A company's Current Ratio improved from 0.9 to 1.3. What happened?'
- Four option cards:
  A) They're now in the danger zone
  B) They moved from danger to acceptable range - CORRECT
  C) No significant change
  D) They have too much cash

Question 4 (Visual Comparison):
- Praxy asks: 'Which company has better liquidity?'
- Two cards:
  - Option A: Ratio 2.1 - CORRECT
  - Option B: Ratio 0.95

Question 5 (Yes/No):
- Praxy asks: 'Tesla's Current Ratio is 1.67. Is this considered healthy?'
- Two cards: YES (correct) | NO
- Explanation: 'Above 1.5 is healthy. Tesla has $1.67 for every $1 of short-term debt.'

Feedback Modals:

Correct Answer Modal:
- Green checkmark âœ… icon
- 'Correct! +30 XP' text
- Praxy avatar celebrating (bigger smile)
- Speech bubble with positive feedback specific to each question
- 'Next Question â†’' button

Wrong Answer Modal:
- Red X âŒ icon
- 'Not quite!' text
- Praxy avatar sympathetic (slight head tilt style)
- Speech bubble: 'Easy mistake! Here's the thing...'
- Two explanation cards:
  - 'âŒ YOUR ANSWER' card (red/rose border) explaining why it's wrong
  - 'âœ… CORRECT ANSWER' card (green border) explaining the right answer
- 'Got it, Continue â†’' button

State Management:
- Track current question (1-5)
- Track score (correct answers)
- Track selected answer for each question
- After question 5 feedback, redirect to /balance-sheet/level/1/complete
- Pass score data to complete page (use URL params or localStorage)

Interactivity:
- Cards are clickable and highlight on selection
- Must select an answer before proceeding
- Show appropriate feedback modal after each answer
- Update progress bar after each question
- Smooth transitions between questions

Mobile responsive. Warm cream background.

Enhance the Level 1 Complete page (/balance-sheet/level/1/complete) with the full celebration experience. Brand tokens:

Colors: Primary Coral #FF6B6B, Secondary Teal #2A9D8F, Accent Yellow #FFD166, Success Mint #06D6A0, Background Cream #FDF8F3, Text Charcoal #264653, Gradient linear-gradient(135deg, #FF6B6B 0%, #FFD166 100%)

Celebration Screen with confetti graphics:

- Confetti animation around the page (CSS confetti pieces floating down)
- Large Praxy mascot (100px) in celebrating mode (bigger smile, sparkles)
- Speech bubble: 'You crushed Level 1! ğŸ‰'

Score Card (prominent, centered):
- Circular score display with percentage: 'Your Score: 4/5' (80%)
- 'Pass Threshold: 80% âœ…' text
- Visual: 5 dots showing correct/incorrect (4 green dots, 1 red dot based on actual score)
- Animate the score counting up

Rewards Section (card with yellow accent):
- '+150 XP Earned' with animated number count-up effect
- Badge Card below it:
  - ğŸ† Trophy icon (large, gold/yellow)
  - 'Survivor Badge'
  - 'You can spot if a company is alive!'
  - Badge should look like an achievement/medal

Stats Row (three columns):
- Time taken: '2m 34s' (can be placeholder or calculated)
- Accuracy: 'X%' (from actual score)
- XP: '+XXX' (30 per correct answer)

Next Steps Card (exciting, forward-looking):
- 'ğŸ”“ LEVEL 2 UNLOCKED!'
- 'Level 2: The Debt Detective'
- 'Who owns this company?'
- Subtle glow/pulse animation to draw attention

Two Buttons at bottom:
- 'Review Answers' (outline button, links back to /balance-sheet/level/1)
- 'Continue to Level 2 â†’' (coral gradient, prominent, links to /balance-sheet - Level 2 should now appear as unlocked in the roadmap)

Unlock Level 2 Logic:
- Store completion state in localStorage so when user visits /balance-sheet, Level 2 shows as unlocked (ğŸ”“) instead of locked (ğŸ”’)
- Update the Balance Sheet Hub page to read from localStorage and conditionally show Level 2 as unlocked

Mobile responsive. Warm cream background. Make it feel celebratory and rewarding!
